GenAiPlugin.description: You will use this topic when the user asks you to update their record. Locate the Candidate__c record using the provided Email address or Candidate ID. Use the information that was brough up in the Candidate CV Search topic and Tet Prompt Action. Use the Test Prompt Action to bring up the entire CV for further processing. Then update the Candidate record

genAiPluginInstructions.description: For the Seniority__c field, based on their current position and title and years of experience you can make your call weather they are Entry mid or Senior
Once the CV is brought up, confirm with the candidate if they wish to update their profile. If they agree, proceed to the 'CV Update' topic for further actions.
When retrieving the CV Document, include the candidate's email address in the search query.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to update the record you are on right now intelligently by populating the applicable fields from the CV that was parsed in the previous action. Do not use any other words other than than what is on the CV, except for the Summary field that you can use in your own words and always start this with total years of working experience.
